attributes.action: Make Logic and Critical Reasoning compulsory at Secondary Level
attributes.additional_details: In today's world of mass media and mass culture, young people are sent many conflicting and contradictory messages. Misinformation, such as pseudoscience, hate speech, and other forms of extremism are rife, and their proponents are highly skilled in rhetoric. Help our young adults to disentangle fact from fiction, hindering the spread of harmful ideologies.
